entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT IN EFFECT, Garden Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.3°C

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of rain beginning near noon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Widespread smoke. Amount 20 mm over western sections. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 near noon then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Local smoke. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Sunday 08 May 2016
